overview.name: TaskFlow
overview.description: TaskFlow is a streamlined task management application designed for small teams to efficiently manage projects and tasks. It offers user authentication, project creation, and task assignment functionalities, enabling teams to collaborate effectively.
overview.architecture: Full-stack application with React frontend and Node.js backend
overview.infrastructure: AWS-based infrastructure with S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and API Gateway

instructions: 2. Install dependencies: npm install (in both frontend and backend)
3. Start development server: npm run dev
4. Build for production: npm run build
